problem.markdown:
>>In the HP Case, how was the second iteration of the new system different from the old system? <<
[x] The factory’s production rate doubled. [x] A small amount of buffer was added between processes. [x] There was an incremental revenue in the hundreds of millions. [x] Labor productivity increased by 50%.
[Explanation] By adding a small amount of buffer to the system, machines did not shut down as often when one sub-assembly would break, leading to higher efficiencies of machines and labor productivity, and ultimately increased revenue. [Explanation]

choiceresponse.label: In the HP Case, how was the second iteration of the new system different from the old system?

There was an incremental revenue in the hundreds of millions.
